attributes.action: Legally oblige everyone to leave their fridge (and freezer) door open to counter the threat of Global Warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all fridges and freezers in the UK were left open, it would potentially aid the fight against global warming by cooling down the UK. If giant fans were installed to blow the cooled air to the West and subsequently cool the Gulf Stream, the whole world may benefit and follow suit. The doors may have to be closed periodically to prevent the onset of another ice age.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
